casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 23, 2013

[Cite as 05/23/2013 Case Announcements, 2013-0hio-2084.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In re Grundstein.

On June 3, 2009, this court found Robert Grundstein to be a vexatious litigator under S.Ct.Prac.R. 4.03. This court further ordered that Grundstein was prohibited from continuing or instituting legal proceedings in the court without obtaining leave. Grundstein has presented a motion for leave to proceed to file a motion to modify order.

It is ordered by the court that the motion for leave to proceed is denied.
